name: Prebid 7.54.3
body:
## What's Changed
* RTB House Bid Adapter: fledgeConfig default values for legacy 7.54.x branch by @piotrj-rtbh in https://github.com/prebid/Prebid.js/pull/10208
* IX Bid Adapter: add 33Across and LiveIntent to EID allowlist by @sajidbsk in https://github.com/prebid/Prebid.js/pull/10231
* Optidigital Bid Adapter : update getUserSync method (legacy) by @optidigital-prebid in https://github.com/prebid/Prebid.js/pull/10194
* consentManagementGPP: do not cancel auctions when CMP is not version 1.0 (7.54.x-legacy backport) by @dgirardi in https://github.com/prebid/Prebid.js/pull/10250

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/prebid/Prebid.js/compare/7.54.2...7.54.3

name: Prebid 6.10.0 Release
body:
## In This Release

**Note**: this version includes some refactoring to support allowing bids from Prebid Server that aren't tied to the Prebid.js AdUnit. We've become aware of a conflict between this feature and the [custom schema](https://docs.prebid.org/dev-docs/modules/floors.html#custom-schema-fields) feature of the Price Floors module. If you use custom floor schemas, please don't use this release. We're working on a fix.
